Articles.Content:
okay so i\'m new to ksp...and evidentally a noob....i installed a few new parts and what not but installing the pluggins i cant get them to install. i\'m currently trying to install these plugins:

mechjeb_1.5.1

dodADAalphav6

hstwCart11

cephei_plugin

and yes i bought ksp so i have the full version.
Find the \'Application Extension\' file and place it in the \'Plugins\' folder. That should make it work.
-sigh- no i had that done already...you honestly don\'t want to know what the issue was....lol sorry about this post guys evidently i\'m more of a fail than i though heh...
